title: I feel a little disappointed with the new 120 ap item
body:
it gives good stats and all but I feel like it is too damn close to being a good item for my singed, that 7% move speed would have been godly, anyway I feel like I'm not going to be able to catch mages at all now without also having to ult and ghost qq. might try it anyway when i comes out. 

edit: also I feel you should only be able to get the 7% movespeed when moving towards enemy champs

replies.body:
so...finally a decent mage kiting item...and you complain and want it so its %%%% for kiting....ok....just cos singed lost nothing from DFG removal, an item that works well on him comes in FOR FREE, and you complain...

get %%%%ed! this item is basically just for ahri anyway. its literally designed to help her change from decent assassin to kite mage... sure anyone can get it, but it looks like its designed BY THE PERSON WHO MADE NEW AHRI!
His opinion, don't get mad about it
yeah i kinda overlooked the active, still not sure about the 7% movespeed might be op might not we'll see
